phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
Laxus's Raijin Tribe have come and attacked in the middle of the Harvest Festival!
They ruined the Miss Fairy Tail Contest, and took the contestants hostage,
and now they have started some battle game!
Except I happened to be stoned right now!
It seems like there is some trouble at Fairy Tail.
Their members are fighting amongst each other.
It is not just quarreling, they have been seriously going at each other!
I hope their big parade, Fantasia, will be okay.
Do not go crazy in the city!
It seems the rules inside the rune barriers only affect wizards.
Play nice and let yourself get blown away!
If I do not put you to sleep, I cannot go search for Laxus!
This is not the time to be fighting amongst ourselves,
but if that is the way you want it!
I have seen through your plans!
You are planning a surprise attack using your Sand Magic, are not you?
But even if you know it is coming, you cannot dodge my attack, Warren!
I told you, I can read your mind!
That is pretty flashy for some festival show.
What a bunch of troublemakers they are!
Defeat your Friends to Save your Friends!
Now hurry and take defeat like a man!
A married man should not be lusting after her like that!
Yeah, it is the Harvest Festival, but...
What is with the sudden style change?
Gunning for the Miss Fairy Tail Contest?
All I did was cut my hair, and look at all the fuss...
Laki took out four, Macao vs. Wakaba's battle is in progress.
Rune traps have been set up throughout the city.
And the ones who are trapped inside are forced to fight.
That is the Battle of Fairy Tail that Laxus talked about.
That is what he is upset about?
What is with this invisible wall?
And what do you plan to do by joining in?
It is a tournament to see who is the strongest!
This is all just Laxus's plan to get us to wipe each other out!
Unless we can defeat the Raijin Tribe within the time limit,
Erza and the other girls will turn to dust.
Everyone is doing whatever they can to prevent that.
It will need something more than our usual way of thinking to take control of the situation!
At this rate everyone who was turned to stone with crumble into dust.
There will not be any way to restore them.
Laxus acts bad, but he are not going to go that far.
Yeah, he gets on my nerves, but he is a fellow guild member.
This is just a fighting festival!
But then why cannot I get out?
People over 80 years old cannot pass through...
Does that mean I am over 80?
I do not think you are, but...
You call Laxus your fellow member?
You do not believe that he will go that far?
There is 2 hours and 18 minutes left.
More than half are gone after the infighting!
You have always been too soft on people...
The East Forest... The East Forest...
I have to see Poluchka and get a potion to cure Erza and the others...
Are the runes set up around the entire city?
I will allow no one to break my rules.
Laxus should have told you that the field of battle was the entire city.
If you are a wizard, then fight!
Damn it, where are those Raijin Tribe?
If you are a Man, then do not take hostages!
Return my sister and the others to normal!
Well, I am not a man...
They look so good... on me.
The only thing that is cute about you is your name.
Return my sister and the others to normal!
Can you beat me while you are blindfolded?
So you can tell where I am by smell.
It is too bad though, because you are already inside my Fairy Dust.
No matter how ugly a monster might be, they become a beautiful work of art when turned to stone.
Give your body up to beauty...
I cannot believe Elfman got beat!
The Raijin Tribe has started to make their move!
Let us settle this fight, man to man!
I thought you turned to stone.
The magic wore off, and I came after you!
I bet you do not know the tricks this man, I mean woman, has up her sleeves!
Do you even have the courage to face me like a man, I mean woman?
A fake you made with your magic?
You are a wizard who can make anything he paints come to life, after all.
If I had not known that, I might have been fooled.
I am begging you, do not hurt anyone any more...
You are not that kind of man...
Battle of Fairy Tail... 40 people left.
I figured Freed could do it!
Is this really the time to be impressed?
Now we cannot get any help from Poluchka!
The whole turning to dust thing is a bluff.
You think I am bluffing, Natsu?
So why are you still here, Natsu?
Well, I guess you call them your children.
I bet you cannot stand watching your children destroy each other, can you?
Natsu and Erza cannot join in...
There is no one left who could defeat my Raijin Tribe, is there?
He is about as strong as Natsu!
He are not going to lose to no Raijin Tribe!
I would not put much faith in that brat.
Part of my Seith Magic is the ability to possess the souls of dolls!
Even if you freeze the dolls, I can transfer their souls to other bodies!
This guy's going to be annoying...
No matter how many of my dolls you destroy, it is no use!
Then I will freeze you directly instead!
Where the hell did he go?
What in the world are you up to?
I want to play with strong opponents!
My babies are gettin' all bored recently!
Using magic is prohibited for those within the barrier until the battle is over!
Guess a long-distance wizard like myself has a bit of an advantage here!
I knew that without your magic, you would be completely helpless!
That will not cut it, Gray!
And after he got hit by my babies like that!
My extra clothing helped cushion against the damage...
Do not go scaring me like that.
You should wear some heavy clothing sometimes, Gray.
See, did not I tell you?
I am sure that he used some dirty trick!
So who will beat the Raijin Tribe now?
Does not seem like he is participatin'.
He does not actually give a damn about the guild anyway.
If you cannot get out, it will not do you any good.
The high and mighty Master of Fairy Tail cannot go surrendering at a time like this!
But if you insist, then how about you give up your position as Master to me?
Was that your goal all along?
It is only one and a half hours until the statues crumble.
If you want to retire, use the guild's loudspeakers and announce it so the whole town can hear.
Say, I am giving up my position as Master of Fairy Tail to Laxus!
Which is more important, your position or your friends?
If you will not fight me, how are you the strongest?
How can you be the master?
I do not care about being master.
But I cannot entrust Fairy Tail to Laxus!
He does not understand the weight of the positoin!
But at this rate Lucy and the others will turn to dust...
Someone has to defeat Laxus and his gang, or...
Gajeel, that is where you were?
I have got a bone to pick with him.
I am not on the side of weaklings!
Thanks to your runes, I have hurt my friends too much.
I told myself it was to change Bisca back to normal...
He sliced through the wind magic?
You are using some strange magic other than the runes...
Anyone who uses magic inside these runes will be deprived of oxygen.
All I did was use runes to their fullest effect.
You think there is anyone who can beat me under my rules?
Why cannot you get out either?
Now I am hungry, you bastard!
And I was not even counted?
I have no more wizards left to fight.
And I thought I could finally show up Erza...
What are you going to do?
Will not she melt if I heat her?
You know, the stone she will...
Erza and the others have turned to stone completely!
We will not know'till we try, right?
Are you going to rub her with flames?
You think that will fix her up?
Use your flames on my iron, and we will weld her back together!
I am sorry, I am sorry, I am sorry!
What were you trying to do?
Perhaps it is because of my right eye.
The artificial eye must have lowered the effect of the magic.
Erza, do you know what is going on?
Even though I was turned to stone, I could hear you.
It is time for a counter attack!
With me restored, the number remaining changed appropriately.
Those three are Natsu, Gajeel, and Erza, right?
There is one more out there, remember?
Does this mean he is back?
Looks like the real war is about to begin.
Another possible candidate for the strongest in Fairy Tail...
Erza's restored and Mystogan joins the fray...
Including me, that is the top three in Fairy Tail.
Cannot be a festival without the best, right?
What is up with the outfit, Erza-chan!
Anyway, a bunch of young folks from your place
have been fighting around the city and causing trouble.
It is part of the preparations for the grand parade.
That is some strange preparations all right.
Try not to fight so much though,'kay?
How did you return from a statue back to normal?
It just means I get to have fun tormenting you more!
Why are you the Fairy Queen, Titania?
I am the number one fairy!
That time we laughed, saying we are both like each other,
we even kindly overlooked the little lies.
If we lose a place to go back to together, I do not care.
Because I will protect that smile.
The meetings and partings numerous as the stars in the sky...
All the things I do not want to lose...
Right now I feel like I do not need any of them.
I just want to see you by my side,
Let us do it like we have just been reborn.
Like flowers blown in a summer wind,
let us bloom brightly in this instant.
Natsu, if you keep baring your stomach, your belly button will get stolen!
If you stick out your stomach when lightning strikes,
the god of lightning will take your belly button away!
But Happy, you do not have a belly button.
Now that you mention it, yeah.
Only rumbling I am scared of is Gramps' grumbling.
